texts.es: hola nuestro grupo se llama Girasoles, estamos intregrado por Santos Pastor Medida (yo) tengo 50 aos de edad y soy coordinador del grupo, cuento con una relojeria ubicada en el barrio Guanacaste, junto a mis compaeros Maria V. de 67 aos de edad con un negocio de venta de frutas, rosquillas y aguacates, nuestra otra compaera Virginia S. de 60 aos de edad con un negocio de comedor (golosinas, desayunos y almuerzos), la ultima integrante del grupo es Jesica S. que tiene un comedor en el cual tambien hace golosinas y almuerzos ella tiene 34 aos de edad, Todos estamos ubicados en el barrio Guanacaste y con mas de 12 aos de conocernos en dicha zona, nuestos negocios nos proveen dinero para tener una vida aceptable, podemos cubrir con los gastos de educacion, comida y salud a nuestros hijos. pero en estos momentos necesitamos tener mayor surtidos nuestros negocios y por tal razon estamos solicitando ayuda para poder salir adelante con nuestros negocios ya que son el porvenir de nuestas familias.
texts.en:
Hello, our group is called Girasoles (Sunflowers), I, Santos Pastor M., have brought us together. I am 50 and am the coordinator of the group. I have a watchmaking shop in the Guanacaste district, together with my fellow team members: Maria V., 67, with a business selling fruits, doughnuts, and avocados; Virginia S., 60, with a cafeteria business (candies, breakfast and lunch); and the last group member, Jesica S., 34, has a canteen in which she also makes doughnuts and breakfasts. We are all located in the Guanacaste district, and have known each other there for more than 12 years. Our businesses provide us enough money for an acceptable life, allowing us to pay for the expenses of education, food, and health for our children. But now we need to have a better selection in our businesses, and for this reason we are requesting help in order to get ahead in our businesses, since they are the future of our families.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase of merchandise

loan.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es:
La seora Blanca, socia del Banco Comunal Mujeres Creativas II, ubicado en AA.HH Rumbo al Futuro Mz.3 Lt.7, distrito de San Fernando, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 aos de edad y 3 hijos. Su esposo es guardin.
Blanca con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la compra de un motokar. En la actualidad cuenta con el 2 motokar, y a parte de ello tambin se dedica en la compra y venta de madera.
Con el prstamo de S/ 1,200, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de su motokar.
Blanca est agradecida de poder contar con el apoyo de su esposo, ambos comparten las tareas de la casa y con ello puede atender el negocio y puede darle educacin a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca, a member of the communal bank Creative Women II located in the San Fernando district of Ucayali, is 40 years old and has three children. Her husband is guardian.

With her first loan of 300.00 soles from Manuela Ramos, she decided to invest in the purchase of a motocar. She currently has two motocars, and in addition to this she also dedicates herself to buying and selling wood.

With the loan of 1,200.00 soles, to be repaid in four months, she will invest in the purchase of spare parts to maintain her motocar.

Blanca is thankful to be able to count on the support of her husband, and both of them share the household duties. This allows her to tend to the business and provide an education for her children.


Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Will invest in the purchase of spare parts to maintain her motocar.

loan.name: Carmela

texts.es:
La seora Carmela, socia del Banco Comunal Indo Amrica, ubicado en AA.HH. Ivan Sick Mz.P Lt.10, distrito D. San Fernando, departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 72 aos D. edad, es madre D. 4 hijos y es viuda. Carmela, con el primer prstamo que recibi D. Manuela Ramos D. S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta D. agua.
Carmela, en la actualidad contina con la venta D. agua y alquiler D. cuartos.
Con el prstamo D. S/ 1,800, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra D. madera y clavos para poder remodelar sus cuartos D. alquiler.
Carmela se siente feliz D. poder contar con un banco comunal que confa en ella ya que gracias a ello ha podido obtener ciertos xitos en su vida y que gracias a todo ello pueD. compartir con sus nietos.
texts.en:
Seora Carmela, a member of the Community Bank Indo Amrica, is located in the District of San Fernando, in the Department of Ucayali. She is 72 years old and is the mother of 4 children. She is a widow. With the first loan Carmela received from Manuela Ramos (S/. 300), she decided to invest in the sale of water. At this time, Carmela sells water and rents out rooms. With this loan of S/ 1,800, which she would repay in 4 months, she would invest in the purchase of wood and nails in order to remodel the rooms she rents out. Carmela feels happy to be able to belong to a Community Bank that believes in her, and thanks to it she has been able to obtain definite successes in her life. Thanks to all this she has been able to share with her grandchildren.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy wood and nails

loan.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Doa Esperanza tiene 47 aos de edad, habita en Hialeah en Managua, casada y con cinco hijos mayores de edad, los cuales los tres la ayudan con los gastos, su esposo trabaja en servicios de seguridad. Actualmente ella cuida a dos nios desde hace un ao, esta iniciativa la hizo con el propsito de ayudar a los gastos de su hogar ya que no se le hace tan difcil, y son ingresos propios de ella. Con la solicitud de prstamo es para hacer un bao y comprar un inodoro ya que no tiene, esto le va permitir mejor comodidad como e higiene en su familia porque actualmente tienen una letrina. A largo plazo es poder terminar de construir su casa con las comodidades que se merece su familia.
texts.en:
Doa Esperanza is 47 years old and lives in Hialeah in Managua. She is married with five adult children, three of whom help with the expenses. Her husband works in security services. She has been caring for two children for a year now with the aim of helping with living costs as it is not so difficult, and the earnings are her own. The loan application is for purchasing a bath and a toilet, items which they dont have. This will allow better comfort and health for her family because they now have a latrine. In the long term, she wishes to finish building her house with the comforts that her family deserves.

Translated from Spanish by Carrie Ting, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Construction of hygenic service within her home

loan.name: Emma Aurora

texts.es:
La seora Emma, socia del Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en el Jr Aguaytia Mz m Lt 22 AA.HH Roberto Ruiz Vargas, distrito de Yarinacocha, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 49 aos de edad y es madre de 3 hijos que an dependen de ella. Es madre soltera y lucha constantemente por el bienestar de sus hijos. Emma con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/.300, decide invertir en la venta de frutas.
Emma contina con la venta de frutas y para ello cuenta con la ayuda de su seorita hija, quien se levantan muy temprano para ir a vender en el mercado N 2. Gracias al esfuerzo puesto por parte de ellas cada da est creciendo en la venta de frutas.
Con el prstamo de S/. 2.000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de frutas y verduras regionales como 1 saco de Cam Cam , 1 saco de naranja, saco de toronjas, culantros, aj dulce y otros.
Emma se siente feliz de poder pertenecer al Banco Comunal porque gracias a ello pudo hacer crecer la venta de frutas. En s Emma es una mujer muy luchadora y exitosa, ya que todo ello es para el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Emma, a member of the Young Women's Community Bank, located in Aguaytia Mz Jr m 22 AA.HH Lt. Roberto Ruiz Vargas, Yarinacocha district, department of Ucayali, is 49 years old and the mother of 3 children who still depend on her. She is a single mother and constantly fights for the welfare of her children. With the first loan that Emma received from Manuela Ramos, she invested in the sale of fruit. Emma continues with the sale of fruit and is assisted by her daughter, who gets up very early to go to sell in the market No. 2. Thanks to their efforts, their fruit sales are growing every day. With a loan of $675, which will be repaid in 4 months, she will invest in the purchase of local fruits and vegetables: 1 bag of camu camu, 1 bag of oranges, bag of grapefruits, coriander, sweet pepper and others. Emma is happy to belong to the Communal Bank because as a result she was able to grow her fruit sales. Emma is a fighting woman and is very successful, as this is for her childrens welfare.

Translated from Spanish by Carrie Ting, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: For the purchase of local fruits and vegetables

loan.name: Bautista

texts.es:
Doa Bautista cumpli 34 aos de edad, estudio quinto de secundaria, es casada y tiene 02 hijos varones de 14 y de 11 aos, vive en la comunidad de Machacmarca.
Es socia del Banco Comunal Ciudad Nueva del Distrito de Pilcuyo, Provincia del Collao Puno, desde que era soltera siempre le gust trabajar con negocio, en ese entonces llevaba ropas a la ciudad de Tacna, desde el ao 2003 empez con la venta de productos de primera necesidad (abarrotes) que vende en la feria de Pilcuyo los das jueves, paralelamente hace tres aos continua con la venta de ropa que distribuye por mayor en la ciudad de Arequipa.
Con este crdito de S/. 2,500.00 Nuevos Soles, que pagar en 04 cuotas y tiene presupuestado comprar: 03 docenas de zapatillas, cada docena cuesta S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, 03 docenas de pantalones Jeans cada docena est S/. 260.00 Nuevos Soles y con valor de S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles comprar ropas para nios, con este capital aumentar ms su mercadera y obtendr ms ganancias.
Su visin es que sus hijos sean profesionales, instalar una tienda de abarrotes en el Distrito de Pilcuyo.
texts.en:
Doa Bautista is 34 years old, she studied until fifth grade, secondary, is married and has 2 sons, 14 and 11 years old, and lives in the community of Machacmarca.

She is a member of "Banco Comunidad Ciudad Nueva", District of Pilcuyo, Province of Collao D Puno. Since she was single she liked to work with business, back then she used to take garments to the town of Tacna, but in 2003 she started selling groceries at the market in Pilcuyo on Thursdays and at the same time selling clothes which she distributes in bulk in the town of Arequipa.

With this loan of S/.2.500 "Nuevos Soles" to be repaid in 4 payments she will purchase the following: 3 dozen footwear, each dozen costs S/.300.00 "Nuevos Soles", 3 dozen jeans, each dozen costs S/.260.00 "Nuevos Soles" and with S/.500.00 "Nuevos Soles" she will buy children's clothing. With the loan she both increases her stock and earnings.

It is her vision that her sons become professionals and set up a grocery store in the District of Pilcuyo.

Translated from Spanish by Lene Struck Christensen, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase garments and footwear to improve business.

loan.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: Doa Juana tiene 60 aos de edad, habita en el barrio 380 de Managua, es casada, con dos hijos de 22 y 25 aos de edad, uno estudia y el otro trabaja y apoya con los gastos de la familia, su esposo trabaja en servicios de seguridad en una empresa privada, la Sra. Juana es ama de casa. Su hija y su marido decidieron mejorar la casa de Doa Juana es por eso que le ayudarn con una inversin de infraestructura. La solicitud de prstamo es para construccin de un muro en la parte trasera de su vivienda para darle ms seguridad a su familia y a sus bienes, para lo cual tiene que comprar, arena, cemento, piedra, y hierro. A futuro es seguir haciendo mejoras ya que con la ayuda de su hija y su esposo espera salir adelante
texts.en:
Doa Juana is 60 years old and lives in neighborhood 380 of Managua. She is married with two children of 22 and 25 years of age; one studies and the other works and supports the costs of the family. Her husband works in security services in a private company. Seora Juana is a housewife. Her daughter and her husband have decided to make home improvements, which is why they are helping her with an infrastructure investment. The loan application is for construction of a wall at the rear of her house to give more security to her family and their property, for which they must buy sand, cement, stone and iron. In the future, she will continue making improvements; with the help of her daughter and her husband, she hopes to succeed.

Translated from Spanish by Carrie Ting, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Construction of a wall in the back of her house

loan.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La seora Gloria pertenece al Banco Comunal Indo Amrica, ubicado en el AA.HH Portillo, Jr. Ricardo Flores Mz.J Lt.36, distrito de Yarinacocha, departamento de Ucayali. Gloria tiene 42 aos de edad, 4 hijos y su esposo es chofer. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta de comida.
En la actualidad Gloria cuenta con una bodega y 2 motokar, y adems recibe el apoyo de sus hijos que la ayudan en la atencin en la bodega y uno de ellos maneja la motokar.
Con el prstamo de S/ 2,500, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de 1 paquete de fideos, 1 galn de aceite, golosinas, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azcar, pasamaneras y otros.
Gloria es una mujer que da a da trabaja para poder brindarle algo mejor a sus hijos y sobre todo una buena educacin y que gracias al banco comunal de Manuela Ramos est consiguiendo ciertos objetivos.
texts.en:
Gloria belongs to the Indo American Community Bank, located in AA.HH Portillo, Jr. Ricardo Flores Mz.J Lt.36, Yarinacocha district, department of Ucayali. Gloria is 42 years old and has four children. Her husband is a driver. With the first loan that she received from Manuela Ramos, she invested in the sale of food. At present, Gloria has a cellar and two motorcars. She also receives support from her children who help in looking after the cellar, and one of her children drives the motorcar. With a loan of $850, which will be repaid in 4 months, she will invest in the purchase of 1 package of noodles, 1 gallon of oil, sweets, 1 sack of rice, 1 bag of sugar, and other items. Gloria is a woman who works every day to be able to offer something better for her children and, above all, a good education. She gives thanks to the communal bank of Manuela Ramos to help her achieve certain goals.

Translated from Spanish by Carrie Ting, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in the purchase of groceries (noodles, oil, rice, sugar, etc.) and sweets

loan.name: Heriberto

texts.es: El Sr. Heriberto tiene 34 aos de edad, casado y con domicilio en el barrio 3-80, su esposa es ama de casa y tienen dos hermosos hijos de 1 y 6 aos de edad, uno est estudiando su primer grado de la primaria. Don Heriberto es electricista automotriz, pintor y soldador, lleva quince aos desarrollando estas actividades, cuando comenz lo hizo de ayudante ahora que adquiri experiencia trabaja por su propia cuenta. La solicitud de crdito la requiere para invertir en la construccin de dos portones grandes para su vivienda, para lo cual tiene que comprar hierro, pintura, y as mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda. Sus planes son hacer crecer su negocio obteniendo mayor cantidad de clientes y as lograr tener su taller con todas las condiciones para brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes. Tambin poder tener salud y los recursos necesarios para ayudar a sus hijos a que estudien.
texts.en:
Mr. Heriberto is 34 years old, married, and owns a home in the 3-80 neighborhood. His wife is a housekeeper, and they have two beautiful children, ages 1 and 6, the older of whom is in first grade. Mr. Heriberto works in automotive electronics, and he is also a painter and a welder with 15 years experience in these fields. He began as an apprentice, but now has enough experience to work for himself. This credit request is to invest in the construction of two large gates for his residence. He'll need to buy iron and paint so that he can improve the conditions of his home. He plans to make his business grow, bringing in more customers, and in that way making sure his shop has everything it needs to provide excellent service to his customers. He will also have sufficient health and resources to help his children go to school.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Construction of two gates for his home

loan.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Esperanza habita en el barrio Hialeah, tiene 43 aos de edad, con tres hijos de 12,14 y 19 aos de edad, los cuales estn cursando la secundaria. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa privada en servicios de vigilancias y siempre est pendiente de la familia. Doa Esperanza alquila cuartos as como tambin alquila telfono, tiene tres aos de tener este negocio y comenz con la intencin de ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar pues el sueldo es un poco bajo, inici alquilando un cuarto, pero ha tenido mas clientela y ahora alquila ms cuartos. La solicitud del crdito es para construir una pila grande para almacenar agua, ya que el agua se va a menudo y necesita asegurar el lquido a sus inquilinos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Esperenza lives in the Hialeah neighborhood and is 43 years old with three children, who are 12, 14, and 19 years old who are in school. Her husband works in a private factory in security and is always firm with the family. Esperanza rents rooms as well as rents a telephone. She has three years in this business, and she started with the intention of helping her husband with the household expense since his wage is a little low. She started renting one room, but she has had more customers and now she rents more rooms. The loan she is asking for is to construct a large battery to store water, now that the water works less often and she needs to secure liquid for her tenants.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Building a water tank

loan.name: Greta Doris

texts.es:
La seora Greta, pertenece al Banco Comunal Indoamerica, ubicado en el Jr. Fiscarral # 246, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Greta tiene 69 aos de edad, es madre de 6 hijos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la confeccin de mosquiteros y sbanas.
En la actualidad, Greta, contina confeccionando sus mosquiteros y sbanas, as como tambin cuenta con el alquiler de habitaciones y por las noches vende comida regional y gaseosa.
Con el prstamo de S/ 1,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de 20 metros de tela y productos de primera necesidad para que pueda preparar la comida que vende por las noches.
Greta est feliz de poder pertenecer a un banco comunal, ya que gracias a ello su negocio puede seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Greta belongs to the Indoamerica Community Bank, located in Jr. Fiscarral #246, Calleria district, Ucayali department. Greta is 69 years old and mother to six children. With the first loan that she received from Manuela Ramos of S. 300, she decided to invest in the manufacture of mosquito nets and blankets.

Currently, Greta continues to make mosquito nets and blankets. She also rents out living spaces and, at night, sells regional cuisine and sodas.

With the loan of S. 1,000, which will be repaid in four months, she will invest in the purchase of 20 meters of fabric and ingredients so that she can prepare the food that she sells at night.

Greta is happy to be able to belong to a community bank since, thanks to it, her business is able to continue to grow.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in the purchase of fabric and ingredients.

loan.name: Ramona

texts.es: hola mi nombre es Ramona A. me dedico a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tengo 61 aos de edad, tengo una pulperia ubicada en la colonia nueva Suyapa, mi negocio es mi unica fuente de ingresos para sustentar mi familia y con la cual hemos logrado sacar adelante nuestro hogar, tengo la ayuda de mi esposo para nuestos gastos. estoy solicitando ayuda monetaria para poder surtir mas mi negocio ya que las exigencias de mis clientes son muchas y quiero que todos queden satisfechos con nuestro negocio, mis clientes me escogen a mi por la atencion que les brindo, ya que para mi, todos mis clientes son especiales y todos merecen ser bien tratados. bueno espero que se me de la ayuda para poder salir adelante. gracias
texts.en:
Hello, my name is Ramona A.. I make my living selling popular foodstuffs. I am 61 years old and have a local store in the new neighborhood Suyapa. My business is my only income source to sustain my family, and with it we have succeeded in getting our family ahead with my husband's help with the expenses. I am asking for monetary help in order to better supply my business, since the needs of my clients are varied and I want to be able to satisfy everybody in our store. My clients come to me because of the attention I give them, since to me, every client is special and all deserve to be well-treated. Well, I hope that you will give me the help to get ahead. Thanks.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase of products to supply her local store

loan.name: Ivonne

texts.es:
La seora Ivonne pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Lomas de Yarina, ubicado en el Jr. Adolfo Lobo # 139, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Ivonne tiene 36 aos de edad, 2 hijos y su esposo es maderero. Con el primer prstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la compra de madera.
En la actualidad, Ivonne, contina trabajando junto a su esposo en la extraccin de madera para luego venderlos. Ivonne y su esposo trabajan con cierta cantidad de personal en la cual viajan a diferentes lugares de los ros para extraer madera.
Con el prstamo de S/ 3,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de combustible y vveres para que as puedan viajar a traer madera.
Ivonne est agradecida de Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad brindada ya que de esa manera puede apoyar a su esposo en los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. Ivonne V. is a member of the Las Lomas de Yarina microfinance institute, located on Jr. Adolfo Lobo # 139, Calleria district, Ucayali department. Ivonne is 36 years old, has two children, and her husband is a timber merchant. She decided to invest her first loan of 300 PEN from Manuela Ramos in the purchase of lumber. Ivonne currently continues to work alongside her husband in logging and selling timber. Ivonne and her husband work with a certain amount of personnel when they travel to different river areas in order to extract timber. They will invest this loan of 3,000 PEN, which will be repaid in 4 months, in the purchase of fuel and supplies so that they can travel to different places and obtain timber. Ivonne is appreciative of Manuela Ramos for the opportunity she has been given because this way, she can help her husband with the family expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase fuel and supplies

loan.name: Jessica

texts.es:
La seora Jessica pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en Jr. Argentina, distrito de San Fernando, departamento de Ucayali. Jessica tiene 22 aos de edad, es soltera y tiene 2 aos trabajando con el banco comunal de Manuela Ramos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta de bisutera.
Hoy Jessica cuenta con un puesto en una galera de venta de ropa y bisutera.
Con el prstamo de S/. 2,700, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de mercadera de ropa como 1 docena de blusa para damas, 2 docenas de pantalones, 2 docenas de aretes y 1 docenas de carteras.
Jessica es una seorita que da a da se esmera para seguir creciendo en su negocio y de esa manera pueda apoyar a sus padres en los gastos de su hogar. Est agradecida del banco comunal por la oportunidad de acceder a un prstamo.
texts.en:
Jessica belongs to the communal bank Mujeres Talentosas (Talented Women), located on Argentina Street in the district of San Fernando, Ucayali. Jessica is 22 years old, is single, and has been working with Manuela Ramos for two years. With the first loan of 300.00 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos, she invested into the sales of costume jewelry.

Today, Jessica has a stall in a clothing and costume jewelry sales gallery.

With the loan of 2,700.00 soles, to be repaid in four months, she will invest in clothing merchandise such as a dozen womens blouses, 2 dozen pairs of pants, 2 dozen earrings and a dozen purses.

Jessica is a young lady who, day to day, works hard to continue growing her business so she can help support her parents with the household expenses. She is thankful to the communal bank for the opportunity to have access to a loan.


Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase of women's clothing, earrings and purses.

loan.name: Lucy Smith

texts.es:
La seora Lucy pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en el Jr prolongacin N:177, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Lucy tiene 53 aos de edad y una pequea hija que an depende de ella. Es madre soltera quien lucha constantemente por el bienestar de su hija. El tiempo que tiene en Manuela Ramos es de 6 aos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/ 300, decide invertir en la venta de productos de belleza.
Lucy cuenta con un puesto en el mercado N 2 , lugar donde vende productos de bisutera y pasamanera como ganchos, carmines, cosmticos, joyas, perfumes y otros, y tambin todo lo que es concerniente a damas, caballeros y nios.
Con el prstamo de S/. 2.000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en compra de 1 docena de vinchas. 3 docenas aretes, 2 docenas de pulseras, joyas, 3 talcos, 4 perfumes, 3 docenas de esmaltes y otros.
Lucy es una mujer muy emprendedora, quien adems est muy contenta de poder contar con el apoyo del banco comunal y que gracias a ello puede surtir ms su negocio.
texts.en:
Miss Lucy belongs to the Talented Women Communal Bank, located in Prolongacion #177, district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. Lucy is 53 years old, ans she has a small daughter who still depends on her. She is a single mother who constantly fights for the well-being of his daughter.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 6 years. With the first loan $125, she decided to invest it in selling beauty products. Lucy has a stand at the Market Number 2, where she sells products like jewelry and trimmings such as hooks, lipsticks, cosmetics, perfumes and others, and also everything for women, men and children.

With the loan of $675, which she will repay over a period of 4 months, she will use it to buy a dozen of headbands. 3 dozens of earrings, 2 dozens of bracelets, jewelry, 3 boxes of talc, 4 perfumes, 3 dozens of nail enamels and others.

Lucy is a very enterprising woman, who is very happy to be able to have the support of the Communal Bank because with the bank support she has been able to buy supplies for her business.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy headbans, earring, bracelets, jewerly, nail enamels, etc.

loan.name: Siloe Group

texts.es: hola nuestro grupo se llama SILOE, lo integramos tres personas las cuales somos: Dunia Y. que soy la cordinadora del grupo, tengo 31 aos de edad cuento con un negocio de produccion y venta de tortillas y charamuscas, negocio que me ayuda a colaborarle a mi esposo para los gastos de nuestro hogar. Mis compaeras Lidia M. tiene 57 aos de edad las cual se dedica a la venta de agua purificada, ya que nuestra colonia no tiene proyectos de agua, la otra compaera es Guillermina P. de 38 aos de edad y cuenta con un negocio de zapatos el cual le ayuda a solventar varios problemas economicos en su hogar, tenemos mas de 10 aos de conocernos y de trabajar juntos. es necesario solicitar una ayuda monetaria para poder salir adelante con nuestros negocios, por tal razon necesitamos que nos den una mano para poder salir adelante y asi poder sobrevivir en nuestro pais que en estos momentos la situacion esta muy dificil, . gracias
texts.en:
Hello! Our group is called SILOE, it includes three people who are: Dunia Y., myself who is the coordinator of the group, I am 31 years old and have a business making and selling toritllas and desserts. This business has helped me collaborate with my husband to cover household costs. My companions are Lidia M., who is 57 and sells purified water, since out village does not have a water project; and Guillermina P., who is 38 years old and has a shoemaking business which helps her resolve various economic issues in her home. We have know each other and worked together more than 10 years. It is necessary for us to obtain a loan in order to be able to move forward with our businesses. For this reason, we need for you to give us a hand in order to push ahead and be able to survive in our country that is currently in a very difficult situation. Thank you!


Translated from Spanish by Laura Jung, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchas of merchandise and raw material to make prepared foods.

loan.name: Maria Marcela

texts.es: La Sra. Maria a sus 59 aos de edad, ha logrado tener su propio negocio en la venta de comida de fritanga, tacos, refrescos y variedad de alimentos con diez aos en las ventas, con domicilio en un barrio de Monte Tabor, con dos hijos que la apoyan de 23 y 24 aos de edad. Doa Maria ha sido una mujer luchadora ya que no cuenta con la ayuda del padre de sus hijos pero no ha sido obstculo para ganarse la vida honradamente. Cuando comenz lo hizo vendiendo enchiladas buscando una alternativa de ingreso de dinero e inici con fondos propios. Con la solicitud del prstamo lo quiere para invertir en compra de productos para hacer ms platillos de comida variada para ofrecer a sus clientes y captar otros. A largo plazo es mejorar la infraestructura del negocio, crecer en clientes como en capital, poder estar siempre con sus hijos y poder brindar ayuda a mis padres que los tengo con vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria, at 59 years old, has been able to have her own business selling tacos, sodas, and a variety of food. She has been in business ten years, and has a home in the Monte Tabor neighborhood with her 23 and 24 year old children who support her. Maria has been a tough woman now that she can't count on the support of her children's father, but it has not been an obstacle in earning herself an honorable living. When she started selling enchiladas, she did it looking for an alternative income and started it with her own funds. She wants to invest this loan in buying products to make more varied dishes to offer to her customers and get new ones. Long term it is to improve the infrastructure of the business, grow in customers as well as capital, to be able to always be with her children and to help with her parents who are still alive.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy materials to make her food

loan.name: Lucinda

texts.es:
La seora Lucinda pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Productivas, ubicado en el AA.HH Santa Clara, en Jr. Calle Walter Mz.B Lt.35, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Lucinda tiene 54 aos de edad, tiene 4 hijos y su esposo es enfermero. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la compra de pltanos.
En la actualidad, Lucinda, contina con la venta de pltanos y frutas regionales. Cada fin de semana se va a la chacra para comprar a los agricultores y luego lo trae a la ciudad.
Con el prstamo de S/ 1,200, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de pltanos y frutas regionales.
Lucinda agradece al apoyo que tienen de las socias que integran al banquito comunal dado que siempre estn animndose unas a otras para seguir adelante y adems se siente muy contenta de participar de las reuniones que tiene con su banquito comunal.
texts.en:
Miss Lucinda belongs to the Productive Women Communal Bank, located in Santa Clara on Walter st. #35, district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. Lucinda is 54 years old, she has 4 children and her husband is a nurse. With the first loan $115, she decided to invest it in buying bananas.

At present, Lucinda is still selling of bananas and regional fruits. Every weekend she goes to a small farm to buy from the farmers and then brings the fruit to the city.

With the loan of $675, which she will repay over a period of 4 months, she will use it buy bananas and regional fruit. Lucinda is grateful of the support from the partners who are part of the small Communal Bank since they are always cheering up each other to continue with their projects and she is very glad to take part of the meetings of her Communal bank.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy bananas and regional fruit.

loan.name: Gema Isabel

texts.es: La joven Gema tiene 27 aos de edad, con domicilio en un barrio de la capital de Managua en Monseor Lezcano, con un hijo de un ao, su esposo trabaja en una empresa privada, como tcnico electricista, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y ropa usada as como la venta de cosmtico e inici hace tres aos con las ventas y solo venda ropa usada. La solicitud del prstamo es para comprar ropa nueva, cosmticos y una paca de ropa usada para ofertar a sus clientes los estilos de variedad de ropa de adultos como de nios. A largo plazo es seguir captando clientes, obtener mejores ganancias, seguir construyendo su casa y velar por su bebe.
texts.en:
Young Gema is 27 years old, with a home in the capital neighborhood of Managua in Monsenor Lezano, with her one year old son. Her husband works in a private factory as an electric technician. He business is selling new and used clothes as well as selling cosmetics, and she started it three years ago only selling used clothes. The loan is being asked for to buy new clothes, cosmetics, and a package of used clothes to offer her clients a variety of styles of adult and children's clothes. Long term it is to keep getting customers, increase her earnings, and keep building her house and taking care of her baby.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Compra de paca de ropa usada

loan.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La seora Margarita pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en el Jr. Coronel portillo N 285, distrito D. Callera, departamento D. Ucayali. Margarita tiene 73 aos, es viuda y madre D. 4 hijos. El tiempo que tiene en Manuela Ramos es D. 5 aos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi D. Manuela Ramos D. S/ 300, deciD. invertir en la venta D. mercadera.
Hoy Margarita cuenta con el negocio D. alquiler D. habitaciones y mini departamentos, los cuales estn construidas en su propia casa. Esta iniciativa es debido a que hay muchas personas que vienen D. otras ciudades y su casa queda en un lugar cntrico D. la ciudad.
Con el prstamo D. S/. 3.000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra D. 4 espejos y algunos materiales D. construccin para remodelar y mejorar la infraestructura D. las habitaciones.
Margarita agradece muy cordialmente a la institucin por la cual se siente muy contenta D. haber conocido a travs del banquito a muchas seoras que ahora son sus amigas y con ellas disfruta momentos muy gratos, adems tiene la oportunidad que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Seora Margarita is a member of the communal bank called "Women with Talent" located in the district of Calleria in the state of Ucayali. Margarita is 73 years old. She's a widow and has 4 children. She has been with Manuela Ramos for about 5 years. With the first loan she received from Manuela Ramos, she decided to purchase merchandise. Currently, Margarita also rents rooms and small apartments which are located in her house. She began doing this because there are a lot of people that come from other cities and her house is located in a central location in the city. With this loan, which she will repay within 4 months, she wil purchase 4 mirrors and other construction materials to remodel the rooms. Margarita is very thankful to this lending institution because she has met other women which are now her riends and now they all have good times together. She also has the opportunity to improve and grow her business.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To purchase mirrors and construction materials

loan.name: Kenia Rafaela

texts.es: Doa Kenia habita en el barrio 3-80, tiene 28 aos de edad, es casada, con tres hijos de 7,8 y10 aos de edad, su esposo trabaja de ebanista. La Sra. Kenia desde hace seis aos tiene una pulpera la cual inici con unos ahorros propios. Desde que empez hasta ahora la pulpera ha experimentado un alto crecimiento ya que Kenia la administra con mucho cuidado y dedicacin. El prstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar granos bsicos y productos de limpieza y poder continuar con la buena oferta que siempre ha mantenido a sus clientes. A largo plazo es incrementar el volumen de venta as como hacer remodelacin en el negocio para que dar un buen servicio a sus clientes. Darle educacin a sus hijos
texts.en:
Doa Kenia lives in the barrio. She's 28 years old. She's married and she has 3 children, ages 7, 8 and 10 years old. Her husband is a woodmaker . Doa Kenia has had a convenience store for the past 6 years which she opened up with her own savings. Since her store opened and up to now, her store has grown over the years due to Kenia's hard work and dedication. With this loan, she's hoping to purchase basic grain products and cleaning products and to continue to offer good and reasonable prices to her clients. Her long term goal is to increase her merchandise as much as possible and to remodel her store so that she can offer the best service to her clients. She would like to continue to offer schooling/education to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To purchase basic grain products and cleaning products

loan.name: Marllory Salome

texts.es:
La seora Marllory pertenece al Banco Comunal Indo Amrica, ubicado en el AA.HH Barrio Unido, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Marllory tiene 26 aos de edad, es madre de un pequeo nio y su esposo es comerciante. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 400, decidi invertir en venta de ropa.
En la actualidad, Marllory, se dedica a la produccin y venta de cigarrillos, dicho producto se utiliza por una costumbre en la Regin, adems ella es proveedora en ciertas localidades o caseros de la Regin
Con el prstamo de S/ 2,500, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en masa de tabaco, compra de etiquetas y cola.
Marllory, es una joven que est siempre viendo posibilidades de negocio, es muy activa y decidida en las actividades del negocio, adems est muy contenta porque le est yendo muy bien.
texts.en:
Seora Marllory is a member of the communal bank called Indo America located in the district of Calleria in the state of Ucayali. Marllory is 26 years old. She has a little boy and her husband is a salesman. With the first loan she received from Manuela Ramos, she decided to purchase some clothes to sale.

Currently, she sells cigarillos wich are small and narrow cigars that are used for a local ritual in her region. She sells them in certain areas and neighborhoods around the region.

With this loan, which she will repay within 4 months, she will purchase the basic ingredients needed to make these cigars such as tabaco, labels and cigar butts.

Marllory is a young entrepreneur who always looking for new business ventures. She's also very happy since her business is doing so well.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To purchase basic ingredients to make cigars such as tabaco leaves

loan.name: Ronaldo Antonio

texts.es: El seor Ronaldo E. , tiene la edad de 55 aos, habita en el barrio Medardo Andino ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , con su esposa Isabel Linarez, esta seora es ama de casa le ayuda con el negocio que lo tienen ubicado en su casa de habitacin, ellos tienen 4 hijos de los cuales 2 tienen a su cargo que estudian su secundaria , este seor se dedica al comercio y la agricultura ya q trabaja 2 manzana de tierras para poder salir adelante con sus pequeos ya que quiere lo mejor para ellos . Don Rolando tiene una pulpera la cual con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio ha logrado tenerla y l esta pasando por una circunstancia difcil ya que por causa de las lluvias se la han daado sus cosas; por que el techo de la vivienda tiene muchos orificios por lo cual solicit un prstamo para comprar zinc y reparar el techo de su vivienda
texts.en:
Mr. Ronaldo E. is 55-years old and lives in the borough of Medardo Andino in the town of Ticuantepe, with his wife Isabel Linarez. Isabel is a housewife that helps with the business that is run out of their home. They have four children of which two are in secondary school. Ronaldo does small trade and farm work and has two blocks of land that he works to get ahead and to provide for his little ones as he wants the best for them. Ronaldo has a grocery store that with great effort and sacrifice he has managed to keep operating through difficult times. Due to heavy rains that have caused damage, he has a lot of holes in his roof and is requesting a loan to buy zinc and repair the roof of his house.

Translated from Spanish by Jenson Abraham, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To repair the roof of his house/business

loan.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia G. S. is in the process of applying for home improvement assistance through a Mexican government program called Conavi. Conavi assists very low-income families by providing a small housing improvement subsidy that supplements a housing loan.This Kiva loan can thus have a big impact, since it is supplemented by additional funds that this low-income family will use to improve their housing circumstances.

Cecilia Gonzlez S. es una muchacha soltera y tiene deseo de terminar una construccin que todava aun no termina ella la comenz con un prstamo que le otorgo su mismo trabajo. Pero ella recurri a nuestra institucin la cual tiene un programa (CONAVI) que es nuevo a la vez satisfactorio para la persona y la sociedad. Ella quiere subir mas alto la barda de su casa para tener privacidad y poner piso en el patio de atrs de su hogar. La cantidad que ella requiere es $950dlares.

Cecilia trabaja en una tienda de muebles y ella comenta que con estos ingresos que ella recibe pagara el prstamo.
texts.en:
Cecilia Gonzlez S. is in the process of applying for home improvement assistance through a Mexican government program called Conavi. Conavi assists very low-income families by providing a small housing improvement subsidy that supplements a housing loan.This Kiva loan can thus have a big impact, since it is supplemented by additional funds that this low-income family will use to improve their housing circumstances.

Cecilia Gonzlez S. is a single woman who very much wishes to complete her construction project. She has been unable to finish it yet, and started with a loan that her own employer provided to her. She has turned to our institution which runs a program (CONAVI), which is new and helpful to both the individual and the society as a whole. She wants to increase the height of the wall of her house, so she has more privacy. She would also like to add a floor to the patio behind the home. The amount she is looking to borrow is $950 USD.

Cecilia works in a furniture store and comments that she will repay the loan with the income from this job.


Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Make improvements to house and add a patio floor.

loan.name: Martha

texts.es:
La seora Martha pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en Jr. Alvarado N 915, distrito de Callera, departamento de Ucayali. Martha tiene 46 aos de edad y 3 hermosos hijos, es casada y su esposo trabaja de instructor en su propio gimnasio. Martha trabaja desde hace 3 aos con el banco comunal de Manuela Ramos y con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la renovacin del gimnasio.
En la actualidad, Martha, contina con el negocio de Gimnasio, en la cual trabaja junto con su esposo. Ambos estn muy contentos porque cada da van teniendo mas acogida de alumnado.
Con el prstamo de S/.3,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de 2 bicicletas de aerbicos.
Martha es una mujer emprendedora que da a da se esmera para lograr grandes objetivos y as seguir creciendo en el negocio del gimnasio y tambin es una mujer empresaria muy activa quien adems se mantiene en forma con los ejercicios diarios que practica
texts.en:
Martha belongs to the Talented Women Communal Bank, located on Alvarado Street #915, in the Callera district, department of Ucayali. Martha is 46 years old and has three beautiful children. She is married and her husband works as an instructor at his own gym. Martha has worked with the Manuela Ramos Communal Bank for three years and with the first loan of 300 soles ($100) that she received from Manuela Ramos, she decided to invest in the renovation of the gym.

Currently Martha continues working alongside her husband at the gym. Both are very happy because every day they are better received by the gym members.

With this loan of 3,000 soles ($1,025), which she will repay over four months, she will invest in the purchase of two aerobic bicycles.

Martha is a very enterprising woman who day after day does her best to achieve her great goals and in this way, keep growing in the gym business. She is also a very active businesswoman who stays in shape with the exercises that she does on a daily basis.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in the purchase of two aerobic bicycles

loan.name: Jos Carlos

texts.es: El Sr. Carlos tiene 54 aos de edad, su esposa le tiene cinco hijos dos varones de 13 y 18 aos de edad, y tres mujeres de 16, 20 y 24 aos de edad, con domicilio en Villa Reconciliacin. Su esposa trabaja como supervisora en un supermercado. Don Carlos vende ropa, zapatos, productos de limpieza y hogar, lleva diecisis aos de estar en las ventas, e inici con dinero propio, desde joven ha sido un hombre trabajador. Con la solicitud del dinero es para comprar mercadera y tener en almacn para ofrecer a sus clientes la variedad y estilo de productos. A largo plazo es seguir incrementando el inventario para obtener mejores utilidades as como ayudar a sus hijos que se preparen con los estudios universitarios para que gocen de una vida digna
texts.en:
Carlos is 54 years old, he and his wife have 5 children 2 sons ages 13 and 18 and 3 daughters ages 16, 20 and 24. Their home is in Villa Reconciliacin. His wife works as a supervisor in a supermarket. Carlos sells clothing, shoes, products for cleaning and the home. He has be in sales for 16 years, and he began with his own money. Ever since he was young he has been a hard working man. With this loan he is asking to buy merchandise and have a store to offer his customers a variety and range of products. His long term goal is to continue increasing his inventory to obtain greater resources such as being able to help his children prepare for university studies and that they have a dignified life.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy products for cleaning and the home

loan.name: Mercedes Gisela

texts.es:
La seora Mercedes pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Lomas de Yarina, ubicado en el Jr. Madre de Dios, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Mercedes tiene 32 aos de edad y es madre de 2 hijos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en productos de belleza.
Mercedes, en la actualidad contina con la venta de productos de belleza y mercadera de ropa y sbanas.
Con el prstamo de S/ 1,500, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de mercadera de ropa slo para damas como 1 docena de short , 1 docena de polos y 1 docena de sbana y edredones y tambin productos de belleza como sombras, talco, perfumes y cremas.
Mercedes se siente muy contenta de poder contar con el apoyo del banco comunal de Manuela Ramos ya que gracias a ello puede seguir surgiendo en su negocio y as mismo puede darle educacin a su seorita hija quien est estudiando.
texts.en:
Seora Mercedes belongs to the Community Bank Las Lomas de Yarina, located at Jr. Madre de Dios in the District of Calleria, in the Department Ucayali. Mercedes is 32 years old and she is the mother of two children. With the first loan of S/. 300 that she received from Manuela Ramos, she decided to invest in beauty products. At this time, Mercedes is continuing with the sales of beauty products and is also selling clothing and sheets. With this loan of S/. 1,500, which she would repay in 4 months, she would invest in the purchase of womens clothing, for example one dozen pairs of shorts, one and a half dozen polo shirts, and one and a half dozen sheets and blankets, and also beauty products like eye shadows, talcum powder, perfumes, and cremes. Mercedes feels very happy to be able to have the help of the Community Bank of Manuela Ramos, and thanks to this she is able to continue improving her business and thus be able to give an education to her daughter, who is studying in school.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To invest in the purchase of beauty products and clothing

loan.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La seora Nelly pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en Jr. Atahualpa N 1030, distrito de Callera, departamento de Ucayali. Nelly tiene 36 aos de edad, 4 hijos, es casada y su esposo es comerciante, Tiene trabajando 6 aos con el banco comunal Manuela Ramos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la compra de fierros de nombre cncamo
En la actualidad, Nelly, contina con diversos negocios, como la venta de cncamos (fierros). Tanto ella como su esposo se dedican al negocio, as como tambin cuentan con una pequea bodega de abarrotes.
Con el prstamo de S/.1,300, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de 100 cncamos (fierros) y abarrotes como 2 sacos de arroz 1 saco de azcar 2 paquetes de fideos, 1 paquete de aceite, caja de leche, etc., para la bodega
Nelly se siente muy agradecida a Manuela Ramos por brindarle la oportunidad de surgir en la vida y poner su propio negocio y as mismo poder apoyar a su familia y darle educacin a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nelly belongs to the Talented Women community bank, located at No. 1030 Jr. Atahualpa, district of Calleria, Ucayali. Nelly is 36, has four children, is married to a vendor and has been working with the community bank for six years. With the first loan of US $100 (S/. 300) that she received, she decided to invest in purchasing cancamo irons. Currently, Nelly continues with different businesses, like the sale of cancamo irons, in which both her and her husband work. They also have a small general store. With the loan of US $450 (S/.1,300) to be repaid in four months, she will purchase 100 irons, groceries such as 2 sacks of rice, 1 sack of sugar, 2 packages of pasta, 1 package of oil, half a box of milk, etc for the general store. Nelly is thankful to Manuela Ramos for giving her the opportunity to emerge in life, have her own business, support her family and provide education to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase irons and merchandise for general store

loan.name: Norma Luz

texts.es:
La seora Norma pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en el Jr. Atahualpa N 1038, distrito de Callera, departamento de Ucayali. Norma tiene 43 aos de edad, es madre de 2 hermosos hijos y est felizmente casada, su esposo se dedica al trabajo administrativo de una empresa. Tiene 5 aos trabajando con el banco comunal de Manuela Ramos y con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta de comida.
Norma alquila un mini departamento y se dedica a la venta de ropa y tambin trabaja en una imprenta haciendo recordatorios.
Con el prstamo de S/.2,300, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de ropa como 2 docenas de pantalones, 2 docena de polos, 3 docenas de blusas y zapatos para damas, tambin mejorar la infraestructura de su mini departamento.
Norma se siente muy agradecida porque se le dio la oportunidad de acceder a un crdito, el cual puede utilizar para invertir y con ello mejorar su estabilidad econmica. Ahora puede contar con su propio capital.
texts.en:
Norma belongs to the communal bank Talented Women, located in the Callera district of Ucayali. Norma is 43 years old, the mother of two beautiful children, and is happily married. Her husband works as an administrator at a company. She has been working with Manuela Ramos for five years, and with the first loan of 300.00 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos she decided to invest in the sale of food.

Norma now rents a small store and dedicates herself to clothing sales. She also works at a printing shop making cards.

With the loan of 2,300.00 soles, to be repaid in four months, she will invest in purchasing clothes such as 2 dozen pairs of pants, 2 dozen tops, 3 dozen blouses and womens shoes. She will also make improvements to her store.

Norma feels very thankful because she was given the opportunity to access credit, which she can invest in such a manner as to improve her financial stability. Now she can rely on her own capital.


Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in the purchase of clothing, as well as making improvements to her small store.

loan.name: Norma

texts.es:
La seora Norma pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Orqudeas, ubicado en Jr. Huaral N 160 P.J Bellavista, distrito de Callera, departamento de Ucayali. Norma tiene 32 aos, 2 hijos y su esposo es motokarrista. Tiene trabajando 5 aos con el banco comunal Manuela Ramos y con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en su bodega.
Norma contina con el negocio de venta de abarrotes y venta de frutas regionales y un motokar. El negocio est ubicado en un lugar estratgico y es por ello que tiene buena venta.
Con el prstamo de S/.3,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de abarrotes, comprar 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azcar, 1 caja de leche, 2 paquetes de fideos, golosinas, 2 cajas de gaseosas y pag la cuota inicial de 1 motokar para mejorar la estabilidad econmica de su hogar. . Norma est completamente agradecida a Manuela Ramos por darle acceso a prstamo y gracias a ello el negocio mejor y adems est agradecida a Dios por la oportunidad que le brindo la vida.
texts.en:
Norma belongs to the communal bank The Orchids, located in the Callera district of Ucayali. Norma is 32 years old, has two children, and her husband drives a motocar. She has been working with Manuela Ramos for five years now, and with her first loan of 300.00 soles from Manuela Ramos she invested in her grocery store.

Norma continues with her business selling groceries, regional fruits, and a motocar. Her business is in a strategic location and, for this reason she experiences a good level of sales.

With the loan of 3,000.00 soles, to be repaid in four months, she will invest in the purchase of groceries such as 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, 1 case of milk, 2 packages of noodles, sweets, and pay an initial installment on the motocar which will help improve the financial stability of her home.

Norma is completely grateful to Manuela Ramos for giving her access to credit and, thanks to this, her business improved. She also thanks God for the opportunities provided in her life.


Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in the purchase of groceries, sodas, and an initial payment on a motocar.

loan.name: Norma

texts.es:
La seora Norma pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Orqudeas, ubicado en Jr. Comandante Barrera N 605, distrito D. San Fernando, departamento D. Ucayali. Norma tiene 51 aos, 2 hijos y su esposo es Mecnico. Tiene 2 aos trabajando con el banco comunal D. Manuela Ramos y con el primer prstamo que recibi D. Manuela Ramos D. S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta D. golosinas.
Norma se dedica a la venta D. golosinas y pasamanera. Da a da sale a vender sus productos para no perder a sus clientes y D. esa manera satisfacer las necesidades D. los mismos.
Con el prstamo D. S/.2,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra D. golosinas como 2 cajas D. galletas, 1caja D. chicle, 3 tiras D. papita lays, 1 caja D. pasta dental y 2 docenas D. jaboncillos.
Norma es una seora que no desmaya en su negocio y es as que a pesar D. ciertos tropiezos que tuvo en la vida sigue sobresaliendo, adems est muy agradecida del banco comunal por el prstamo que le brinda.
texts.en:
Miss Norma belongs to The Orchids Communal Bank located in Comandante Barrera N 605, district of San Fernando, in the department of Ucayali. Norma is 51 years old, she has 2 children and her husband is a Mechanic. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Communal Bank for the past 2 years and with the first loan of $120, she decided to invest it in selling candies.

Norma sells candies and trimmings. Every day she goes out to sell her products in order to keep her clients happy and to meet their needs.

With the loan of $675, which she will repay over a period of 4 months, she will use it to buy candies such as, 2 boxes of cookies, 1 box of chewing gum, 3 strips of Lays chips, 1 box of toothpaste and 2 dozens of small soaps.

Norma is a lady who works tirelessly in her business, so even after certain stumbles that she has had in life she keeps on working hard. Also she is very grateful of the support given by the Communal Bank.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy supplies and candies

loan.name: Rosa Andrea

texts.es:
La seora Rosa pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en Jr. 2 de Mayo N 634, distrito de San Fernando, departamento de Ucayali. Rosa tiene 35 aos de edad, 3 hijos, su esposo es Profesor y tiene 4 aos trabajando con el banco comunal Manuela Ramos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en la venta de comida.
En la actualidad, Rosa, cuenta con un puesto de comida y golosinas en una Institucin Educativa. Tambin cuenta con una bodega en su propia casa y en la cual atiende con la ayuda de sus hijas y su esposo.
Con este prstamo de S/.3,000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de golosinas y alimentos de primera necesidad para que pueda cocinar sus deliciosos desayunos y almuerzos que vende en la Institucin Educativa.
Rosa se siente realizada y a pesar de las muchas dificultades puede llevar adelante el negocio y as mismo puede darle estudios a sus hijos y tener una mejor solvencia econmica.
texts.en:
Miss Rosa belongs to the Talented Women Communal Bank, located at 2 de Mayo N 634, district of San Fernando, in department of Ucayali. Rosa is 35 years old, she has 3 children and her husband is a Teacher. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Communal Bank for 4 years. With the first loan of $125, she decided to invest it in selling food.

At present, Rosa has a food and candy stand at an Educational Institution. She also has a grocery store at her own house that she runs with help of her daughters and her husband.

With this loan of $1025, which she will repay over a period of 4 months, she will use it to buy candies and essential foods, so she can cook her delicious breakfasts and lunches that she sells at the Educational Institution. Rose feels fulfilled and in spite of many difficulties she has been able to make her business work. She wants her children to go to school and have a better economic solvency.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy candies and essential foods.

loan.name: Rosa Alvina

texts.es:
La seora Rosa pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Talentosas, ubicado en la calle Piura N 189, distrito D. Calleria, departamento D. Ucayali. Rosa tiene 68 aos D. edad, es madre D. 7 hijos y su esposo es jubilado. Con el primer prstamo que recibi D. Manuela Ramos D. S/. 300, deciD. invertir en la venta D. jugos y hamburguesas.
En la actualidad, Rosa, continua con el negocio D. venta D. jugos y hamburguesas. Se levanta a las 5 D. la maana para realizar la preparacin D. los jugos para luego poder venderlos.
Con el prstamo D. S/. 1.000, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra D. frutas como naranjas, manzanas, panes, papaya y azcar.
Rosa es una mujer que a pesar D. su avanzada edad le gusta estar en actividad y adems est completamente agradecida del Banco Comunal Manuela Ramos por esa gran ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Rosa belongs to the communal bank Mujeres Talentosas, located at 189 Calle Puera in the Callera districtof the Ucayali region. Rosa is 68 years old and the mother of 7 children. Her husband is retired. With the first loan she received from Manuela Ramos, for 300 Peruvian soles, she invested in the sales of juices and hamburgers. Currently Rosa continues selling juices and hamburger. She gets up at 5 every morning to prepare the juices she will sell later in the day. With this loan for 1000 Peruvian soles, which she will repay in 4 months, Rosa will invest in the purchase of fruit such as oranges, apples, papaya and sugar. Rosa is a woman who despite her advanced age like to be active. She is completely appreciative of the great help the Manuela Ramos communal bank provides her.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To invest in the purchase of fruit.

loan.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Doa Reyna habita en un barrio de la capital, llamado Laureles Sur, tiene 38 aos de edad, con dos hijos de 14 y 20 aos de edad, su esposo es comerciante y esta pendiente de su familia. La Sra. Reyna trabaja en servicios domsticos en una casa particular, desde hace un ao, ya que se propuso trabajar para ayudar a su esposo y a sus hijos a que sigan estudiando. Con la solicitud de prstamo es para infraestructura en la construccin de una pared de su casa ya que las paredes que tiene son de tabla y quiere comenzar hacer mejoras para estar bien con su familia. A largo plazo es terminar de hacer su casa, y poder ayudar a sus hijos a que estudien.
texts.en:
Reyna lives in the capital city in a neighbourhood called Laureles Sur, she is 38, has two children ages 14 and 20, her husband is a vendor that takes care of the family. A year ago, Reyna started providing domestic services in a private house to help her husband, and to help her children continue studying. The loan request is to build a wall in her house because the current walls are made of thin wood and she wants to make improvements for the well-being of her family. In the long term she wants to finish her house and be able to help her children with their studies.

Translated from Spanish by Sofia Burt, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Build a wall

loan.name: Tania

texts.es:
La seora Tania pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Lomas de Yarina, ubicado en Av. Jos Faustino Snchez # 451, distrito de Yarinacocha, departamento de Ucayali. Tania tiene 31 aos y es madre de 2 hijos. Con el primer prstamo que recibi de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300, decidi invertir en productos de belleza.
Tania, en la actualidad contina con la venta de productos de belleza.
Con el prstamo de S/ 1,500, el cual ser pagado en 4 meses, invertir en la compra de productos de belleza como 2 colonias, 3 esmalte, 2 sombra, 5 lpices labial y 3 perfumes.
Tania es una madre bien jovial con muchas ganas de seguir adelante y a pesar de algunas adversidades ella sigue adelante. Adems est muy agradecida de que se le de la oportunidad de acceder a un crdito el cual puede trabajarlo de manera independiente.
texts.en:
Tania belongs to the communal bank Las Lomas de Yarina, located at 451 Avenida Jos Faustino Snchez in the Yarinacocha district of the Ucayali region. Tania, 31, is the mother of 2 children. With the first loan she received from Manuela Ramos for 300 Peruvian soles, Tania decided to invest in beauty products. Tania continues to work selling beauty products. With this loan for 1500 Peruvian soles, which she will repay in 4 months, she will invest in the purchase of beauty products, including 2 types of cologne, 2 nail polishes, 2 types of eye shadow, 5 lip pencils and 3 perfumes. Tania is a young and happy mother eager to move herself ahead. Despite obstacles she continues working to move forward. She is very appreciative for the opportunity to be loaned the capital that allows her to work independently.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: She will invest in the purchase of beauty products.

loan.name: Horacio Alexander

texts.es: Don Horacio habita en un barrio de la capital de Managua ubicado en ciudadela Nicaragua, casado y con dos hijos de 13 y 18 aos de edad, que estn cursando la secundaria, su esposa es ama de casa y cuida de su familia. El Sr. Horacio es fotgrafo con treinta aos de experiencia, lo mas difcil fue el inicio el poder hacer su clientela. Con el prstamo es para invertir en capital de trabajo en compras de material fotogrfico y as poder siempre ofrecer sus fotos de estilo y variedad. A largo plazo es poder instalar un estudio fotogrfico, remodelar su casa y poder dar estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Horacio lives in a neighborhood in the capital of Managua located in the citedel of Nicaragua. He is married with two children ages 13 and 18, who are studying in secondary school; his wife is a housewife and she takes care of the family. Horacio is a photographer with 30 years of experience. The most difficult part was the beginning in establishing a clientele. With the loan he will invest in buying photographic materials and in this way always be able to offer a variety of styles of photos to his clients. In the long term he wants to install a photographic studio, remodel his home and be able to continue with his childrens education.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Invest in photographic materials

loan.name: Dolly

texts.es:
La seora Dolly, socia del BC Picota, vive en la Regin San Martn, provincia y distrito de Picota. Se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, gelatinas y flan. El negocio est ubicado en su domicilio, en la Carretera Fernando Belaunde Terry s/n, en dicho lugar atiende a los clientes, los cuales son los vecinos y transentes que visitan su distrito.
Con el prstamo de S/. 1,000, el cual ser pagado en 6 meses, comprar gelatina en cantidad, azcar, leche y gaseosas de diferentes marcas, tamaos y sabores, para que los clientes encuentren lo que requieran.
Dolly tiene 34 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, quienes la apoyan en la atencin de los clientes. Es una mujer muy perseverante y responsable, con ganas de salir adelante y apoyar a su esposo en la economa de la casa. Desea contar con un local para la venta de refrigerios.
texts.en:
Dolly is a member of the Communal Bank Picota, she lives in the San Martn region in the province and state of Picota. She sells soda pop, gelatin, and flan (pudding). The business is located in her home, on Carretera Fernando Belaunde Terry s/n, where she takes care of her customers, many of whom are neighbors and visitors to her area. With the loan of S/. 1,000, which will be repaid in 6 months, she will buy gelatin in bulk, sugar, milk, and different sizes, brands and flavors of soda pop so that her customers may find what they need. Dolly is 34 years old, she lives with her husband and children, who help her serve her customers. She is a responsible woman and very perseverant, with the drive to succeed and support her husband in meeting household expenses. She wishes to have a locale to sell snacks.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy gelatin in bulk, sugar, milk and soda pop.

loan.name: Flor De Canela (C) Group

texts.en:
The Flor D. Canela ("Cinnamon Flower") group is maD. up of 13 people who work as blacksmiths, selling car parts, upholstery, CD sales, sewing and selling clothing, and potato and vegetable sales. The president, Mrs. Carmen Rosa M., sells different types of potatoes that she imports from Peru in bulk in the city of El Alto (La P.). When their loans were disbursed, the president reminded the group members to be cautious and responsible in their behavior during this loan cycle and towards AgroCapital.* All the group members agreed to keep working this way both for this loan cycle and for those to come.

Most of the women plan to use their loans to buy more merchandise to sell.

*Loans that appear on Kiva have actually already been disbursed (so that clients don't have to wait for their loan to be funded on Kiva); Kiva's partner MFIs are reimbursed at the end of each month. This is why Flor D. Canela has already received their loan.

Translated and elaborated by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva fellow

El Banco Comunal Flor D. canela C esta compuesto por 13 personas que se dedican a la venta D. herrera, tambin a la comercializacin, ropas que elaboran y las comercializan, venta D. papa, verdura, Y la presidenta la Sra. Carmen Rosa M. es comerciante D. venta D. diferentes variedades D. papas que impota desD. Per para repartir por mayor en la ciudad del alto ( La P.) Durante el desembolso la presidenta los recomend a sus asociados para tengan el cuidado necesario, y la responsabilidad para trabajar en este ciclo que empieza y tambin hacia la institucin. Y se comprometieron a trabajar y que en el siguiente ciclo tambin puedan seguir participando D. la misma manera D. cmo se esta empezando.

loan.use: Buy merchandise in bulk to resell

loan.name: Ederlinda

texts.es:
La Seora Ederlinda, socia del Banco Comunal Las Orqudeas, vive en la Regin y Provincia de San Martn, distrito de Tarapoto. Se dedica a la confeccin y venta de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y nios y sbanas que despus sale a vender a sus amigos, familiares y a clientes en los pueblos ms cercanos.
Con este prstamo de S/. 1,000, el cual cancelar en 06 meses, comprar hilos de diferentes colores, blondas, telas de diversas variedades, colores y acabados, elsticos, agujas, etc., y de esa manera poder contar con lo necesario para tener un buen acabado en las prendas que ella confecciona y satisfacer las exigencias de sus clientes.
Ederlinda tiene 37 aos, vive con su esposo y sus hijos quienes la motivan en todo lo que ella se propone. Es una mujer positiva y emprendedora. Su meta es comprar una maquina industrial para tener su propio taller de costura y dar trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ederlinda is a partner in the "Orchids" Communal Bank. She lives in the San Martn region and province, in the Tarapoto district. Ederlinda is a seamstress, and she sells clothing for women, men, and children, as well as sheets. She sells these products to her friends, family, and clients in nearby towns. With a loan of 1,000 soles, Ederlinda will buy colored thread, lace, a variety of fabrics, as well as hems, elastics, needles, etc. She'll pay back the loan in six months. In this way Ederlinda can have the necessary tools to add detail to the clothes that she makes, and satisfy her clients. Ederlinda is 37 years old, and lives with her husband and children. She is an optimistic, hard-working woman, and her family is the motivation behind all that she does. Ederlinda's goal is to buy an industrial sewing machine in order to have her own sewing workshop and create jobs others.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: She will by thread, lace, fabric, elastics, etc.

loan.name: Gledis

texts.es:
La seora Gledis, socia del BC Mujeres Rumbo al Desarrollo, vive en la Regin y provincia de San Martn, distrito de Morales. Se dedica a la venta de golosinas, chupetes, dulces regionales y frutas como el aguaje y man. Realiza las ventas de manera ambulatoria en una de las principales calles de su distrito, frente a la plaza de armas, lugar muy concurrido por lo que le va muy bien hasta la fecha.
Con este prstamo de S/. 800, el cual ser cancelado en 4 cuotas, comprar aguaje en saco, azcar en saco, bolsitas para chupetes, dulces de diferente sabores y variedades, man en kilos para tostar y darle diversos usos (dulce de man o saladito).
Gledis tiene 35 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y 2 de sus hijos quienes an dependen de ella. Gladis es una mujer muy perseverante y responsable, con ganas de salir adelante y apoyar a su esposo en la economa de la casa. Desea tener una casa y poner un negocio en la misma.
texts.en:
Mrs Gledis is a partner of the "Women Towards Development" communal bank. She lives in the region and province of San Martin in the district of Morales. Mrs Gledis sells candies, lollipops, peanuts, regional sweets and fruits like aguaje. She is a street vendor and is settled in one of the main streets of her district, in front of the main square, as it is a very crowded spot, her business has done very well so far. Gledis requests a loan of S/. 800, which she will pay in 4 installments. With it, she will buy sugar, candies of different types and flavors, peanuts (which she will toast and sell either sweet or salty), aguaje and little bags for the candies. Gledis is 35 years old, she lives with her husband and together they have 2 kids who still depend on them. Gledis is a very persevering and responsible woman and she has the drive to succeed and to help her husband with the house expenses. Gledis hopes to own a house and to open up a little business herself.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Almendares Leistner, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To buy sugar, candies of different types and flavors, peanuts, aguaje and little bags for the candies

loan.name: Giovani

texts.es:
La Seora Giovanni, socia del Banco Comunal Las Orqudeas, vive en la regin y provincia de San Martn, distrito de Tarapoto. Se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. Giovanni est creciendo poco a poco en el negocio, porque no tiene mucho tiempo en el negocio, apenas 1 ao y le va bien. El negocio est ubicado en su propio domicilio en el Jr. Bolognesi N 1102, lugar donde acuden diariamente a comprar los clientes que son mayormente los vecinos de su barrio.
Con este prstamo de S/. 800, el cual cancelar en 6 cuotas, comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar en saco, leche, aceite, conservas en cajas de diferentes tamaos, papel higinico en paquetes y otros productos de mayor rotacin y as surtir bien el negocio y que los clientes encuentren lo que buscan.
Giovani vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos que an estn pequeos. Ella que a sus 28 aos es una mujer trabajadora, carismtica y con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando para crecer en el negocio porque le gusta lo que hace, tambin quiere darle una profesin a sus hijos. Su meta es crecer en el negocio y llegar a vender al por mayor.
texts.en:
Mrs. Giovanni, a member of the Communal Bank Las Orqudeas," lives in the region and province of San Martn in the Tarapoto district. She sells groceries. Giovanni is growing little by little in her business, because she hasnt been open for very long, barely 1 year and her business is going well. The business is located in her own home at Jr. Bolognesi N 1102, a place where her customers gather daily to shop as they are primarily her neighbors from her neighborhood. With this loan for S/. 800, which will be repaid in 6 payments, she will buy basic needs products such as rice, bagged sugar, milk, oil, different sizes of canned goods, packages of toilet paper, and other products that sell quickly and in this way stock her business well so that the customers find what they are looking for. Giovani lives with her husband and 2 small children. She is 28 years old, hard-working, charismatic, and with a great desire to continue working to grow her business because she like what she does, and she also wants to provide a profession to her children. Her goal is to grown the business and become a wholesaler.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy basic needs products such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, etc.

loan.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria Isabel Z. L. is in the process of applying to purchase a home through a Mexican government program called Infonavit. Infonavit provides working families with a low cost mortgage to purchase a small starter home. Some families incomes land them just short of qualifying for the program, however. This Kiva loan allows them to make up the difference with a small supplementary loan and thus qualify to purchase their first home. La seora Maria Isabel Z. Lpez va a tramitar una casa de infonavit por que desea empezar un patrimonio para su hija ya que ella es madre soltera.Prefiere estar pagando su propia casa en lugar de pagar renta . Maria trabaja en una maquiladora de esta misma ciudad con el transcurso de los aos ella ha recopilado ciertos dinero para tramitar su casa pero aun as no completa la cantidad para la casa. Ella solicita la cantidad de $325 dlares.

loan.use: Comprar casa

loan.name: Hidelsa

texts.es:
La Seora Hidelsas, socia del Banco Comunal Judith Tuanama, vive en la regin y provincia de El Dorado, distrito de San Jos de Sisa. Se dedica al cultivo y venta de cacao. Hidelsa cultiva en su chacra para luego venderlo a los compradores mayoristas del distrito y los recolectores de cacao que vienen desde Tarapoto en busca de esta semilla la cual es muy buscada en el mercado.
Con este prstamo de S/. 1,500, el cual cancelar en 6 cuotas, comprar abonos e insecticidas para asegurar la produccin, tambin pagar la mano de obra de los peones, ya que requiere de ellos para realizar los trabajos de cuidado de la chacra y de esa manera sacar un buen producto porque depende de ello para darle buen precio al producto y as satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
Hidelsa tiene 36 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos, quienes la apoyan en las actividades de la chacra. Es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando. Su meta est en aumentar la chacra en el cultivo de cacao y construir una casa.
texts.en:
La Seora Hidelsas, socia del Banco Comunal "Judith Tuanama", vive en la regin y provincia de El Dorado, distrito de San Jos de Sisa. Se dedica al cultivo y venta de cacao. Hidelsa cultiva en su chacra para luego venderlo a los compradores mayoristas del distrito y los recolectores de cacao que vienen desde Tarapoto en busca de esta semilla la cual es muy buscada en el mercado. Con este prstamo de S/. 1,500, el cual cancelar en 6 cuotas, comprar abonos e insecticidas para asegurar la produccin, tambin pagar la mano de obra de los peones, ya que requiere de ellos para realizar los trabajos de cuidado de la chacra y de esa manera sacar un buen producto porque depende de ello para darle buen precio al producto y as satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Hidelsa tiene 36 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos, quienes la apoyan en las actividades de la chacra. Es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando. Su meta est en aumentar la chacra en el cultivo de cacao y construir una casa.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buy fertilizer, insecticide, and pay wages of her workers

loan.name: Juana Maria
